Context.set("unity", Context.get("currentMessage"))

function fact (n)
  if n <= 0 then
    return 1
  else
    return n * fact(n-1)
  end
end

local number = tonumber(Context.get("currentMessage"))

local result = fact(number)
Debug.print(tostring(result))

Workflow.branch(81)
Template.compile([[Write a number to know its factorial]])
